You receive a vision of the future through the Force, giving you or one willing creature you can see within range a chance to change fate. When the chosen creature makes an ability check, an attack roll, or a saving throw before the power ends, it can dismiss this power on itself to roll an additional [[/r d20]] and choose which of the d20s to use. Alternatively, when an attack roll is made against the chosen creature, it can dismiss this power on itself to roll a [[/r d20]] and choose which of the d20s to use, the one it rolled or the one the attacker rolled.

If the original [[/r d20]] roll has advantage or disadvantage, the creature rolls the additional [[/r d20]] after advantage or disadvantage has been applied to the original roll.

Force Potency. When you cast this power using a force slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.
